Class Star

  • java.lang.Object
    • Star

  • public class Star
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a star. Contains good/bad label.

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        x - start pos x of player
        y - start pos y of player
        lvl - is the level the star is in
        pW - is the array of physical words
        mW - is the array of mental words
        sW - is the array of social words
